title: Thompson's bid for back-to-back shocks cracked in Tokyo
description: Australian battler Jordan Thompson's ambitions of a second straight shock win in the Japan Open were finally worn down by rising US star Ben Shelton.
author: Ian Chadband

title: Long before hitting a glass ceiling in the workplace, women face a 'broken rung,' report finds
description: Although women have made gains in representation at the senior level, advancements are slower the manager and director levels, according to a recent report.
author: Jessica Dickler

title: What you need to know about every D-I men's conference in 2023-24
description: Each Division I conference's 2023-24 season will be shaped by these storylines -- from transfers to win streaks, realignment talks to wide-open races.
author: Myron Medcalf

title: An effective interest rate cap: a clarification. (arXiv:2307.08861v4 [econ.GN] UPDATED)
description:
The national legislation of some countries imposes restrictions on lending
rates, interest rate caps (ceilings). Most countries restrict the effective
(rather than nominal) interest rate, which includes all commissions and fees
that may come with a loan. In this case, a generic wording of this restr...
author: Mikhail V. Sokolov

title: Probability of Causation with Sample Selection: A Reanalysis of the Impacts of Jóvenes en Acción on Formality
description: This paper identifies the probability of causation when there is sample selection. We show that the probability of causation is partially identified for individuals who are always observed regardless of treatment status and derive sharp bounds under three increasingly restrictive sets of assumptions...
author: Riva, Flavio

title: Flexible global forecast combinations. (arXiv:2207.07318v2 [econ.EM] UPDATED)
description:
Forecast combination -- the aggregation of individual forecasts from multiple
experts or models -- is a proven approach to economic forecasting. To date,
research on economic forecasting has concentrated on local combination methods,
which handle separate but related forecasting tasks in isolation. ...
author: Ryan Thompson, Yilin Qian, Andrey L. Vasnev

title: On the use of artificial intelligence in financial regulations and the impact on financial stability. (arXiv:2310.11293v1 [econ.GN])
description:
Artificial intelligence (AI) is making rapid inroads in financial
regulations. It will benefit micro regulations, concerned with issues like
consumer protection and routine banking regulations, because of ample data,
short time horizons, clear objectives, and repeated decisions that leave plenty
of ...
author: Jon Danielsson, Andreas Uthemann

title: Life-Cycle Effects of Comprehensive Sex Education. (arXiv:2310.11151v1 [econ.GN])
description:
Sex education can impact pupils sexual activity and convey the social norms
regarding family formation and responsibility, which can have significant
consequences to their future. To investigate the life-cycle effects of social
norm transmission, this study drew on the introduction of comprehensive ...
author: Volha Lazuka, Annika Elwert

title: Digital interventions and habit formation in educational technology. (arXiv:2310.10850v1 [econ.GN])
description:
As online educational technology products have become increasingly prevalent,
rich evidence indicates that learners often find it challenging to establish
regular learning habits and complete their programs. Concurrently, online
products geared towards entertainment and social interactions are somet...
author: Keshav Agrawal, Susan Athey, Ayush Kanodia,

title: Tractable Aggregation in Endogenous Network Formation Models. (arXiv:2310.10764v1 [econ.TH])
description:
This paper presents new conditions under which the stationary distribution of
a stochastic network formation process can be characterized in terms of a
generating function. These conditions are given in terms of a transforming
function between networks: if the total transformation between two networ...
author: Jose M. Betancourt

title: Biden says the Pentagon has data Israel was not behind Gaza  strike
description: Biden kept up a very public demonstration of solidarity with Israel on Wednesday, telling reporters the Pentagon showed him evidence Israeli forces were not behind the Gaza hospital blast.
author: Rob Crilly

title: A balanced Commanders offense is about more than just pass vs. run
description: Coordinator Eric Bieniemy’s goal of achieving balance focuses on the variety of threats the Commanders’ offense can pose.
author: Nicki Jhabvala

title: Israel's 'evidence' hospital blast was caused by misfired Gaza rocket
description: Israel this morning sought to absolve itself of any responsibility, sharing a slew of evidence it claims proves that a misfiring rocket fired by Palestinian Islamic Jihad (PIJ) was behind the blast
author: David Averre

title: JK Rowling 'happy' to go to jail for calling someone by wrong pronouns
description: The Harry Potter author said she rather do time in a British prison for misgendering than submit to 'compelled speech'.
author: Martin Beckford

title: Police accuse innocent man after paedophile next door used his wifi
description: Richard Wynne, 48, used the internet in the village of Llanrheadr, Powys in Wales to engage in sex chats with who he thought was a 13-year-old girl, but was in fact an undercover police officer.
author: Lettice Bromovsky

title: Rishi Sunak slams 'rush to judgment' on Gaza hospital disaster
description: At PMQs, Rishi Sunak insisted the UK was working with allies 'rapidly analysing' evidence after hundreds were killed at the al Ahli site.
author: James Tapsfield

title: Rapper slammed by MP for lyrics that boast about murder of schoolboy
description: Huddersfield artist Booter Bee has been slammed by Labour MP Barry Sheerman over his lyrics that 'boast about the gangland knife murder' of a schoolboy.
author: Lettice Bromovsky

title: Amazon said to have spent $1B on Microsoft 365
description: Over a million licenses for office software to be used by corporate and frontline workers
author: Dan Robinson

title: Natalee Holloway murder suspect Joran van der Sloot to plead guilty
description: Natalee Holloway murder suspect Joran van der Sloot's is expected to plead guilty today to trying to extort her family in exchange for information about her death, claiming he would 'take them' to her body if he received $250,000.
author: Germania Rodriguez Poleo

title: What was that?! Huge explosion and flash of light rocks Melbourne
description: A huge blast has rocked the northern suburbs of Melbourne , with video showing a flash of light just before 9pm.
author: Levi Parsons

title: Fugees reunite with Pras Michel one last time before he is sentenced
description: The Fugees will reunite with Pras Michel for one last tour before he is sentenced - after the star said Wyclef Jean and Lauryn Hill asked him in a text: 'Listen, let's rock. You down?'
author: Claudia Aoraha

title: Teen jailed after stabbing topless sunbather
description: The 16-year-old who cannot be named for legal reasons, was obsessed with beheading videos and hardcore porn and 'hunted' potential victims, sometimes waiting in toilet stalls for women.
author: Editor

title: Biden recounts his family tragedy during Israel meet with responders
description: President Joe Biden brought up his own family tragedy from 1972 while greeting Israelis who responded to the horrific Hamas attack.
author: Geoff Earle

title: iPhone 15 Pro Max OLED burn-in issue might be fixed by iOS 17.1
description: Apple has acknowledged the OLED burn-in issues that some iPhone 15 Pro Max owners experienced, and iOS 17.1 should offer a software fix.
author: Chris Smith

title: Fan on the Field at Phillies Game Gets LEVELED in One of the Best Security Takedowns You’ll Ever See
description: A fan at Tuesday's Philadelphia Phillies game was the latest to receive a painful lesson in what happens when one decides to jump onto the field.
author: @mediaite

title: 2024 coaching hot seat preview: Who's at risk, who's up next for a new job
description: Another season, another impending coaching carousel. But before that starts spinning, here are our preseason thoughts on potential candidates -- both to be fired and hired.
author: Jeff Borzello

title: Alec Baldwin seen outside Manhattan home following potential charges
description: Baldwin, 65, put on a brave front as he stepped out in the Big Apple the day after prosecutors said they are seeking renewed involuntary manslaughter charges against the actor.
author: Will Potter

title: US Embassies under siege in Middle East after Gaza hospital strike
description: In Beirut non-essential embassy staff have been evacuated after angry protests descended into a fire. The State Department has now issued a 'do not travel advisory' for Lebanon.
author: Jen Smith

title: Calling a Spade an Implement: The Media’s Struggles With ‘Terrorism’
description: Few words cause journalists such discombobulation as “terrorism” does, which the Hamas massacre of about 1,400 Israelis has laid bare once again.
author: @mediaite

title: Russian Duma Passes Bill to Revoke Ratification of Nuclear Test Ban Treaty
description:
Russia's parliament moved swiftly to fulfill the wish of President Vladimir Putin by completing the passage of a bill that shifts Moscow's legal stance on nuclear testing at a time of acute tension with the West.


The lower house, the State Duma, on Wednesday passed the second and third readings of...
author: Reuters
